title: End of Term
description: For Lawrie Marlow, the end of term play was the most important event of the term, but her twin Nicola had several other problems - not the least, the grudge that the new games captain seemed to have against her. But Nicky too was involved in the Christmas play, which is a momentous finish to the Marlow twins' first term in Lower IV A.
author: Antonia Forest
